android_external_port.description: Externally-visible port on the Android Skia build master.

android_internal_port.description: Internally-visible port on the Android Skia build master.

android_master_host.description: Hostname (or IP address) that can be used to reach the Android Skia build master.

android_master_internal_fqdn.description: What the Android Skia build master thinks its own FQDN is.

android_slave_port.description: Port used by Android build slaves.

autogen_svn_url.description: URL of the SVN repo used for auto-generated assets.

buildbot_git_url.description: URL of the git repository for Skia's buildbot code.

code_review_site.description: URL of the project's code review site.

code_review_status_listener.description: URL of the code review site's status listener.

commit_bot_username.description: Email address of the commit queue committer (commit-bot)

console_default_rev_limit.description: Default number of changes to load from history when building the console page.

console_max_rev_limit.description: Maximum number of changes to load from history when building the console page.

compile_external_port.description: Externally-visible port on the Compile Skia build master.

compile_internal_port.description: Internally-visible port on the Compile Skia build master.

compile_master_host.description: Hostname (or IP address) that can be used to reach the Compile Skia build master.

compile_master_internal_fqdn.description: What the Compile Skia build master thinks its own FQDN is.

compile_slave_port.description: Port used by Compile build slaves.

cq_required_steps.description: Steps which are not allowed to fail on the commit queue.

current_sheriff_url.description: URL that displays the current sheriff and his/her schedule.

next_sheriff_url.description: URL that displays the next sheriff and his/her schedule.

default_webstatus_refresh.description: How often (in seconds) to reload the buildbot status page if not specified.

fyi_external_port.description: Externally-visible port on the FYI Skia build master.

fyi_internal_port.description: Internally-visible port on the FYI Skia build master.

fyi_master_host.description: Hostname (or IP address) that can be used to reach the FYI Skia build master.

fyi_master_internal_fqdn.description: What the FYI Skia build master thinks its own FQDN is.

fyi_slave_port.description: Port used by FYI build slaves.

gatekeeper_steps.description: Steps which trigger the gatekeeper on failure.

gce_compile_bots_zone.description: The zone of the Compile buildbots on GCE.

gce_project.description: The project name for the Skia GCE instances.

gce_smtp_port.description: SMTP port that is open on Skia GCE instances.

gce_smtp_server.description: SMTP server that is accessible on Skia GCE instances.

gce_smtp_user.description: SMTP user which can send emails on Skia GCE instances.

gce_username.description: The user name of the buildbots on Skia GCE instances.

googlestorage_bucket.description: Root of our Google Storage tree.

master_branch_name.description: The git branch on which the bots operate.

num_gce_compile_bots.description: The number of Compile buildbots on GCE.

private_external_port.description: Externally-visible port on the private Skia build master; not intended to be accessible!

private_internal_port.description: Internally-visible port on the private Skia build master.

private_master_host.description: Hostname (or IP address) that can be used to reach the private Skia build master.

private_master_internal_fqdn.description: What the private Skia build master thinks its own FQDN is.

private_slave_port.description: Port used by private build slaves.

public_external_port.description: Externally-visible port on the Skia build master.

public_internal_port.description: Internally-visible port on the Skia build master.

public_master_host.description: Hostname (or IP address) that can be used to reach the public Skia build master.

public_master_internal_fqdn.description: What the public Skia build master thinks its own FQDN is.

public_slave_port.description: Port used by public build slaves.

revlink_tmpl.description: Template for links to specific revisions in Skia.

skialab_username.description: User name of buildbots in SkiaLab.

skialab_router_ip.description: IP address of the SkiaLab NAT router

skia_dashboard_add_point_url.description: URL for adding bench data to the Skia dashboard on Appspot.

skia_git_url.description: URL of the Skia Git repository.

skia_svn_url.description: URL of the Skia SVN repository.

tree_status_baseurl.description: Base URL of the Skia tree status AppEngine instance.

tree_status_url.description: URL that displays the status of the Skia tree.

try_svn_url.description: URL of the SVN repository used for try requests.
